revised_title: Revolutionary Rowing Techniques for Men of War in Calm Conditions
tldr: The author, Monsieur Du Quet, proposes a new method for rowing men of war in calm conditions using revolving oars. This innovative technique allows for more efficient and uniform movement, as well as reduced fatigue for the rowers. The author shares his findings and experiments, including a comparison between a vessel with revolving oars and a traditional one, demonstrating the advantages of the new design.
